name: Robbie Sherre
title: Generative AI & Front-End Engineer | LLM Applications • React • Advanced State Management
summary: Front-end and generative AI engineer building large-scale, user-centric web apps with React, Next.js, and modern state-management (Redux Toolkit, RTK Query, Context). Experienced delivering production component systems, integrating LLM capabilities, and shaping polished UX with accessible, performant, and maintainable code. Comfortable across the stack (Node/Express, Python/Django) with solid CI/CD and testing practices.
highlights: Generative AI / LLM Integration
Redux Toolkit & RTK Query
React Context API
Advanced State Management
TypeScript
React Hooks
Next.js (App Router)
Design Systems & Storybook
Docker & Kubernetes
CI/CD (GitHub Actions, Jenkins)

roles.title: Front-End Web Developer
highlights: Architected responsive member-portal features (billing, scheduling, pharmacy); improved satisfaction and reduced mobile bounce.
Converted 100+ legacy HTML/RESX assets into reusable AEM components; accelerated content updates by 40% across 500+ microsites.
Developed Single Billing Office solution in React; led integration testing and multi-region rollout.
Shipped MyChart Evolution enhancements; increased portal engagement by ~25% and reduced support calls by ~15%.
Implemented modern CI/CD and containerized delivery for scalable, reliable releases.
Automated release flow with Git + Jenkins; trimmed manual steps by ~60% and sped time-to-production.
Implemented state-management patterns using Redux Toolkit for global state and React Context API for lightweight shared state (authentication, theme).
Designed modular Redux slices for complex business logic, async data fetching, and API integration with Thunks/RTK Query.
Leveraged Redux DevTools for state-change tracing, improving developer productivity and reducing bugs.
Balanced Context for simplicity and Redux for predictability/scalability to ensure performance and maintainability.
Delivered production React apps with predictable, centralized state, improving UX and architecture clarity.

roles.title: Front-End / Content Web Developer
highlights: Led WordPress MU network of 500+ healthcare sites; standardized templates/workflows to improve launch speed by ~30%.
Drove transition from BCssP TeamSite to AEM; trained content teams and documented best practices.
Configured MyChart/Epic Systems localization to ensure consistent terminology and regulatory compliance.
React front ends + WP MU back ends for 500+ microsites (including CVS).
Testing & Quality: TDD, ESLint/Prettier, cross-browser, WCAG accessibility.
Design & Collaboration: responsive design, UX strategy, Agile/Scrum, Adobe Photoshop.

roles.title: Front-End Developer (Freelance)
highlights: Built React/Vue microsites for film clients; integrated JSON APIs for dynamic, mobile-first experiences.
Custom WordPress themes/plugins; deployed across Shopify, BigCommerce, WooCommerce, Squarespace.
Translated brand guidelines into responsive, WCAG-compliant UIs with designers/UX.
Architected FE with React Hooks/Redux, Vue Composition API/Pinia, real-time updates via REST/WebSockets.
Implemented relational (MySQL/Postgres) and NoSQL (MongoDB/Redis/Cassandra) data layers, including optimization and migrations.
Testing: Jest/Cypress e2e achieving ~95% coverage; reduced production bugs.
DevOps: Docker/Kubernetes, CI/CD with GitHub Actions/Jenkins/CircleCI, Terraform/CloudFormation.

ai_projects: Slack bot (Node.js + OpenAI) auto-summarizing threads; cut meeting prep time by ~50%.
GPT-4 customer-support chatbot automating ~70% of inquiries; first-response time from 4h to <30m.
TensorFlow.js in-browser intent classifier for scheduling; ~92% accuracy, −75% manual parsing.
TensorFlow CNN for manufacturing defect detection; ~96% precision, reduced inspection costs by ~40%.
